website_summaries.verdict: Thanks to 3M, the creator of all things adhesive, keeping your computer investment clean doesn't have to be overly expensive, messy, or time-consuming.
pros: A single cloth can be used multiple times, and does not require additional cleaners to remove dust, dirt, and fingerprints
Cloths are not treated with any chemicals and have no off-putting odor
Also works for eyeglasses, cell phones, and TVs
cons: Some buyers find the cloth more rough than they would like
not comfortable using on more delicate lenses, such as on a camera

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Needed a nice, but affordable cloth for my chromebook (queen smudgey fingers here). This was one of the first ones that popped up and, after reading the reviews, it was a no brainer. Excellent microfiber cloth that does exactly what I need it to. Very soft yet durable and appears to be easily cleaned (though I have not tried to yet). I just drape it over my chromebook before putting it into the case and I have it with me wherever I go. Helps a lot in class when you don't want fellow students eyeballing your gross screen and wondering why you are such a grease ball. :-P But seriously, a nice little cloth and well-priced. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Lili St. Cyr

customer_reviews.title: I bought 4 of these like 8 years ago and the only way they go ...
customer_reviews.text: They last literally forever. I bought 4 of these like 8 years ago and the only way they go bad is if you give them away. You can wrap one around your digital device while you travel to prevent scratches, you can wipe your glasses with them without streaks. They trap dust like a magnet. If they get dirty, throw them in the dryer. Only downside is that you have to huff hot air onto screens with spit stains/water marks to wipe those off. You might get light headed on a large monitor.

I own several of these 3M cloths and I use them to clean all my device screens (computer, TV, Phone, tablet, etc). There really isn't too much to say about them. They work great. customer_reviews.text: I have used Scotch Brite cloths for years and have never had a problem or been disappointed in performance or durability. About the only thing you can do wrong is use a laundry agent such as Bounce. I have hand washed these cloths and also thrown them in the washer over and over without a problem. I use them on desktop and laptop screens, TV screens, eye glasses, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Faye L. Bowring

customer_reviews.title: Works Well & Cleans Efficiently
customer_reviews.text: This cloth has been under my use for several months and so far I'm pleased with the results. I always keep my workspace close to spotless so I can't say that I've given it a 'industrial strength' workout, but it does the job well, picks up the lint and dust, and doesn't scratch or blemish my equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Richardson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR CLEANING CELL PHONE AND TABLET SCREENS
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how this cloth does it, but it cleans the surfaces of iPhones and iPad's beautifully. I don't add any cleaning agent and it seems to just erase the fingerprint marks. I bought this because I used a friends cloth. He had his in his car for a year without washing it and he used it on a daily basis to clean his cell phone and sun glasses. It still cleaned my iPhone wonderfully. I used my newly cleaned iPhone to buy this cloth for myself on amazon.com : )
customer_reviews.author: Orchid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: A must handy tool to keep around electronics. I spritz a little surface cleaner and wipe it with this cloth and get excellent results.
customer_reviews.author: SweetChelle

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: It leaves no lint, which is what I was looking for, and cleans very well. It smells a little odd, but that goes away with the first wash. Very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not really as impressive as I expected it to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Not really as impressive as I expected it to be. Was trying to clean my macbook with it. Much harder to clean with this than the cloth that comes with the mac.
customer_reviews.author: Tridib Saha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing like this product made by 3M. First rate.cloth for cleaning optics or screens, I've always relied on 3M products for top quality!

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaning cloth ever
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt this is the best product I've come across to clean glasses, computer screens, and mirrors without streaking or scratching delicate surfaces.
